text: Trent's Last Case is a 1929 American crime movie directed by Howard Hawks and is the second version of the 1913 novel of the same name by E. C. Bentley. It stars Raymond Griffith, Marceline Day, Raymond Hatton, Donald Crisp, Lawrence Gray, Anita Garvin and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== *Trent's Last Case at IMDB *Trent's Last Case at SilentEra Category:1929 movies Category:1920s crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks
title: Trent's Last Case (1929 movie)
